title: Train.Simulator.2015.PROPER.CRACK.ONLY-CODEX
description:
Train Simulator 2015 PROPER (c) RailSimulator.com 

    Release Date :  9/2014                         Protection : Steam
    Discs        :  1                              Genre      : Simulation


   Ever dreamed of driving trains? Now you can! Train Simulator brings to
   life the thrill of driving high speed trains on real world routes in
   incredible detail. 
   Welcome to TS Academy: Your career starts here! Learn to master all
   kinds of trains, locations and situations as you qualify to be a train
   driver. 
   Real World Routes: Ride the rails on New York's busiest passenger route,
   take an alpine adventure from Munich and drive the express service to
   London in a variety of challenging career scenarios. 
   Build your dream: Turn your hand to building your own routes with a 
   suite of powerful and easy to use creator tools and download more 
   routes and locos from the store. 

   TS2015 features three stunning routes for you to enjoy: 

   East Coast Main Line: London-Peterborough, including First Capital 
   Connect Class 365 and Hitachi Class 801 trains
   
   NEC: New York-New Haven, including Amtrak ACS-64 and Amtrak Acela 
   Express trains 
   
   Munich - Garmish-Partenkirchen, including DB BR 426 and DB BR 411 
   `ICE-T' trains. 

    
   - Extract
   - Burn or mount the .iso
   - Run setup.exe and install 
   - Copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
   - Play

   PROPER Notes: In the SKIDROW release the train derails after a 
   certain time

   This pack is the Standard Edition. We have a bunch of dlc's which
   we will try to deliver at a later time.   
     
   Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go 
   online ..


                       CODEX is currently looking for:

                          nothing but competition!

                              are you ready
